reviews.comments: Tiene una ubicación inmejorable. La verdad es que el departamento es muy lindo. Conocimos sólo a Max y fue muy agradable. Todo perfecto.

El dpto esta super bien ubicado @ mts de av santa fe con todos los metro y subte D a 5 cuadras. A cuadras de lo mejor palermo soho. El eduficio tiene seguridad 24hs y eso es excelente. Los guardias super amables, nos prestaron cargador de celu q olvidamos¡!  Max super atento a cada necesidad q pudimos tener. Todo maravilloso. La pasamos genial. El dpto muy lindo, luminoso. Se extrañan los mates de la mañana mirándo el verde de los platanos que caracterizan a pal
Ubicación in mejorable . dpto. Comodo. Edificio de categoría.
Todo excelente
Muy lindo departamento, con todo lo que se detalla en el aviso. Cómodo y seguro. Excelente atención de los dueños. Seguramente volveremos
Muy buena ubicación y excelente atención de Max, siempre dispuesto a ayudar

Departamento iluminado y acogedor con muy buena ventilación... su ubicación es fantástica.  A unas cuadras del centro de palermo soho y holliwood.  A una cuadra de distrito arcos para realizar compras. Puntualmente fui a tramitar la visa con mi hijo de año y 10 meses y nos encantó el lugar. Posee seguridad las 24 hs, pileta con mesas y quincho para realizar un asadito: impecable! !!! Y los dueños se hicieron presentes desde el momento cero.  Ayudándonos a instalarnos y adaptándose a nuestras necesidades. ..  super recomendable! !!!!
Departamento muy acogedor, excelente ubicación, anfitrión atento a las necesidades, ambiente cómodo, práctico y excelentes facilidades (pileta, gym)

Max, un tipo de primera.  El depto coincide totalmente con las fotos. Es silencioso y el edificio nuevo, moderno y seguro. Su ubicacion es ideal: corazon de Palermo, cerca de subtes, trenes y paseos comerciales.  La cocina ideal para cocinar lo que se pretenda. Baño comodo y amplio.
Esta muy bien ubicado!
El Dpto esta en una zona increible todos los mejores lugares bares y hasta tiendas a un paso! La torre es muy linda el Dpto es igual a las Fotos muy coqueto
el departamento de Máx y Giselle es muy lindo.... esta en un zona bastante central donde tenes todo cerca. muy limpio y bastante acojedor. los recomiendo son excelentes anfitriones!
Lindo departamento en una zona muy céntrica de la ciudad.

Un departamento hermoso
muy cómodo para pasar unos días en Buenos Aires 
El Barrio increíble y Max nos ayudó en todo inmediatamente , pasamos hermoso 
Recomendadisimo este depto

La comunicación con Max fue excelente! Estuvo siempre presente en todo lo que solicitamos.
El Depto en general por fotos es precioso, pero fue una pena que lo encontramos en feas condiciones, muchas cosas sucias, rotas, la calentadora de agua oxidada por ejemplo :( creo que deberían prestarle un poco de más atención a su servicio de limpieza y mantenimiento. 
Por el resto todo muy bien! Gracias por hospedarnos! :)

Todo muy bien, destaco la atención y preocupación en cualquier cosa que necesitásemos. Muy buenos anfitriones!
El barrio muy seguro, tranquilo y con varios locales para salir a comer y beber. Totalmente recomendable!
Muy buena disposición del anfitrión y contacto permanente ante posibles necesidades o requerimientos. Recomendable.

El apartamento es muy lindo, súper cómodo, está ubicado en una excelente zona, cerca de buenos restaurantes y tiendas bastante curiosas a unos buenos precios, los anfitriones excelentes, súper atentos.

El departamento es pequeño pero acogedor, decorado con sencillez pero mucho gusto. El edificio es bastante nuevo, con portero 24 horas. La zona es buena, cerca de los restaurantes conocidos de Palermo y a distancia razonable de los Bosques.

Los anfitriones se hicieron presentes al llegar y al despedirnos, siempre preocupados de que estuviéramos bien.

Una experiencia increíble,  el departamento estuvo muy limpio y cerca de todo definitivamente regresaría. 

Gracias Max & Giselle!
Todo excelente!
Many Thanks, Max it was great for our colleagues!
Excellent cozy apartment! This place is very nice, the title get's it right; it's actually very cute. Well located, just three blocks from the subway so that's awesome. Would definetly come back!
Everything went out exactly as expected. Max is a great host and the apartment didn't disappoint, exactly as the photos. Great place!

Max & Giselle were extremely responsive and had the kindness to arrange flexible check-in and check-out times to fit my flight schedule. The place was spotless, very comfortable and close to a lot of cute and trendy bars and restaurant. I had a great time and would definitely stay there again!
Schicke Wohnung und an bester Lage in Palermo Soho. Max war sehr hilfsbereit und hat sehr schnell auf meine Fragen geantwortet. Auf jeden Fall zu empfehlen.
This is a very stylish apartment and we wouldn’t have wanted to stay anywhere else.

Perfectly located, very clean and pretty. Nice swimming pool area.
Recommended highly !

This is an excellent place to stay in Buenos Aires! It is close to many great places such as Plaza Armenia, Plaza Serrano, Plaza Italia, Hardin Botanico, and many others. We loved the neighbourhood full of cafes, bars and restaurants. Later on we stayed in Retiro and we wished we could go back to Palermo and stay there more time.

Max is an exceptional host! He helped us a lot by giving us many hints on where to go, eat and spend nice time. He is the best host we have ever met.

The appartment was well-arranged. We came to Buenos Aires with a 2 years old child, so the separate living room and bed room were very useful.

We used the swimmimg pool as well and we enjoyed it a lot. Everybody in the building were nice to us and helpful. 

We would definately recommend it and stay there again!

The apartment is in a great location - lots of great restaurants and a quick cab ride away from the main sightseeing locations. The apartment building is very nice, I wish we could take advantage of the pool but didn’t have enough time! The apartment itself is equipped with mostly everything you may need, although I would recommend bringing your own toiletries. 
Max arranged for a very easy check-in and was very easy to communicate with throughout our stay. Overall a great airbnb experience!

Uma super opção!! O apartamento é uma delícia e a localização é perfeita para fazer tudo caminhando. Encontrei tudo em ordem, limpo e bem arrumado. 
Não diz respeito ao apartamento, mas quem for por temporada e quiser uma opção para fazer exercício, não dá para contar com o que tem no edifício.
Obrigada Max & Giselle pela super atenção! Resposta rápida e cuidado.
We had a lovely stay! Max was super sweet to swing by with his cute puppy and make sure we were settled in! Adorable balcony, and a comfy queen bed!

The Appartement is really cute and you have everthing you need. The location is just perfect. Bars and Restaurants are close by. The communication with Max and Giselle was also perfect, they did response within minutes. 
It was a really great stay!

This place was in a secure and perfectly located place in Polermo, close to a metro station. If you are a neat freak, this place might not be for you, but it was sufficient for our 3 day stay in BA. Communication with Max was easy - everything was done in English. Max attend to all our needs when we had requests. Wifi is excellent and Uber is working from this apparent.

Location, location!  This was in a very handy location to explore BA!  Close to a mall, subway and tons of restaurants.  We felt very secure in this building and the area that it was in.  The apartment is cozy and nicely situated on the 2nd floor.  Max was a great host.  All in all a great experience!  (URL HIDDEN) dog loved it!

It was the first place we rented through Airbnb and it was perfect! The apartment is excellent, very well located, clean, organized. Max was a great host, and helped us in everything !! We were very well received! Max's family lives in the same building and this bulbs a lot of security. We rented a good garage with the couple in the same place. It was a great holiday trip !! we love!!
Max and Giselle were very nice and helpful. The apartment was just as described. Recommended!

Max and Giselle's place was exactly as describe. The neighborhood is quite and nice to walk. The communication was very good. I would recommend other people to stay there. I definitely would stay again.

O apartamento é claro, arejado e bem dividido. O prédio parece seguro e os porteiros atenciosos. Max é solicito e responde as mensagens em poucos minutos. A limpeza da casa, porém, não foi satisfatória. O sabonete usado pelo hóspede anterior ainda estava na saboneteira. Fios de cabelo do hóspede anterior estavam na banheira. Cigarros fumados pelo hóspede anterior estavam no cinzeiro. A manutenção de alguns equipamentos do banheiro também não foi satisfatória. A saboneteira estava quebrada e fixada com uma fita isolante. O suporte do chuveiro (estilo europeu) estava quebrado e fixado com uma fita isolante, o que exigia um certo malabarismo na hora de tomar banho. Foi preciso segurar o chuveiro com uma mão e lavar a cabeça com a outra.

We had a great stay! It's a lovely, sun-soaked apartment with a nice balcony and the best wifi and most comfortable mattress we had during our trip through Argentina. Max and Giselle's place is in a fantastic neighbourhood - for us the best neighbourhood to be in when visiting Buenos Aires. The security at the entrance of the building makes you feels safe and offers you the opportunity to store your luggage when arriving early and leaving late.

Our stay at Max and Gisells house was perfect. It was close to the Subte (subway),  close to many shops restauraunts, and the outlet mall. Getting in and settled in was easy thanks to them. Thank you!

Max and Giselle are incredible hosts. The apartment was perfect for my girlfriend and I. Clean, tidy, comfortable. The pool in the court yard was an excellent way to begin the day. We wanted for nothing. Close to a number of restaurants, fruit stands, shops and public transportation. Max even stopped down to make sure we knew the sights to see and that we were getting along well and enjoying our stay. We definitely will be staying with them during our next trip to Buenos Aires.

I just can say perfecto!!!
Location: Everything you need is just a few blocks around. Metro, Bus, Restaurants, etc.
Flat: Clean, cosy, with aircondition, a small blacony and a guard.
Host: Max was a great host. He is very helpful and kind. As he lives in the same house communication is easygoing. 
I strongly recommend this flat, we had a great time there.

Great location in Palermo . Close to everything you need. Cute cozy apartment with beautiful decor and a wonderful pool area that you can relax in. Max was very helpful and responsive whenever I needed something ( like a cab to the airport or where the closest grocery store was) wonderful stay.

This place was perfect for us. It is within walking distance to all the best restaurants in Palermo, close to the subway and close to an outlet mall! We enjoyed the pool everyday and cooked breakfast in the kitchen each morning. There was a small issue with the AC and Max came to the room right away when we let him know and helped us fix it. The security at the front gate made us feel very secure and everyone in the building was very friendly

The apartment is in a great location, close to restaurants, groceries, parks, and public transportation. Our hosts were so responsive, helpful, sympathetic, and communicative. They went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable and they helped us to enjoy our stay in Palermo Soho.
Great location, and a very comfortable place to stay.  Wonderful hosts.
You'll love this place: location, amenities, restaurants, shopping, safety, pool, laundry, and workout facilities. Max is a great host and responsive to all your needs.

This Airbnb exceeded my expectations in every way. Max was very helpful in guiding me to the local restaurants and shopping areas and very responsive if I had a question. The location is perfect and walking distance to many parks, museums, restaurants and shopping areas. The Palermo subway stop is a five minute walk. The public areas are very nice and well maintained and I loved hanging out by the pool and chatting with some of the residents. I hope to stay here again in a year!! Ciao...Bill

We did enjoy our stay a lot, the location is excellent for going out and enjoying nightlife, and the pool is very nice, too: sunny all day long and with several deck chairs. Communication with Max and Giselle was very easy, and they were so kind to let us check out several hours later on our last day. We were not perfectly happy with the bed though, the mattress was very soft and should probably be changed. Apart from that, a beautiful apartment that we would recommend our friends.
It's a great place to stay, with a central location and easy access to lots of bars and restaurants. The part I love the most is the breeze coming through the windows!

Max and Giselle's place is very well located in Palermo. A short walk to buses, the subway, delicious places to eat and drink, and the tour bus stops right outside their place! Having a 24/7 security guarded entrance was a nice calming factor, and the pool/outdoor facility was nice. We would happily stay here again.

Perfekt Lage um die Stadt zu erkunden. Palermo ist ruhig und hat viele schöne Bars um den Abend ausklingen zu lassen. Die U-bahn und die öffis sind auch gleich um die Ecke und von dort kommt man schnell und günstig überall hin. Das Apartment war für uns perfekt. Sauber, Ruhig (Für eine Großstadt) und mit der kleinen Küche hat man alles was man braucht wenn man ein wenig Geld sparen möchte.
This is the second time we've stayed with Max & Giselle and it was perfect per usual.  Thanks to them, we've made this our home away from home in B.A.

O apartamento é exatamente como mostram as fotos, bem localizado (há um mercado bem perto do prédio, um shopping a algumas quadras e restaurantes nas proximidades). Para quem pretende viajar de carro não há estacionamento incluído, o anfitrião se disponibiliza a alugar uma vaga de garagem e as três vagas em frente ao prédio só podem ser utilizadas por três horas.

Max sempre muito atencioso, responde em  poucas horas sobre dúvidas e pedidos. O bairro, Palermo Soho, é ótimo para quem curte a vida noturna com excelentes restaurantes, bares, e o apartamento fica há uma quadra do charmoso shopping outlet Arco Distrito. Existe também uma variedade de mercadinhos, frigoríficos, ''kioscos'' e outros serviços nas proximidades do apartamento. Boa sorte e boa viagem a todos. Ah... e  o edifício é muito bom, seguro, tranquilo e confortável!!!
It has been a real pleasure staying at Max & Giselle apartment. Everything was 100% perfect!

Tidy and fazzy place to stay. Close to center and u-ground system which makes it very convenient. Max is of a very good help, especially for the first day when you need to get yourself set up (enet, sim card, advises on shopping etc.). Support after the initial set up is very helpful too. Thanks guys. Much appreciated.
Nice apartment in a great area, close to the underground with a helpful host
Max was really helpful with our stay. He went out his way to show us where to go and was quick to respond to any queries.

Perfect apartment for staying in buenos aires! We loved it and it felt like home for a week. Communication with Max is really easy and he was very helpful when we had questions! I definetely recommend this place to everyone!

Max was a fantastic host, whenever we needed him, he was there. The appartement is very lovely and clean. The location is great, metro and train stations are very nearby. Overall we had a terrific time!

Max e ótima pessoa e preocupado com seus hóspedes e o bom estar dos mesmos. Muito solícito, disponível e educado. O apartamento e novo, bem localizado e bem equipado. Tudo conforme anunciado. O bairro é a nosso ver um dos melhores de Buenos Aires para turistas dos 5 aos 100 anos :)

Max was an excellent host. He welcomed us quickly and we could not find space to park our van so he spoke to us in the (URL HIDDEN) was quite cold...telling us some places to go. I had a query about printing during the stay and he gave very accurate directions. The location is fantastic, peaceful street that felt safe, nearby to a shopping mall, convenience store and lots of restaurants and bars. We would certainly go back to Buenos Aires and stay with Max. Good ice cream just down the street too!!

Max was a very prompt and welcoming host. Even before I booked with him, he was very helpful in answering any questions I had in regards to his listing and its location. Check-in was very smooth and easy. Max gave us a warm welcome on our first full day and also offered us some pointers on getting around the city including things to do, places to see and restaurants at which to eat (Bartola was one of our FAVOURITE eating experiences and just a nine minute walk from the apartment!). 

The apartment is beautifully laid out and furnished- we truly wanted for nothing while we stayed there. The space is exactly as pictured and I was happy to experience the light pouring in and filling the space just as I saw in the photographs. The location is wonderful- in the heart of Palermo Soho, it is just a few minute's walk from the Subte and great things to do, yet still far enough away from the main hustle and bustle of the neighborhood to feel very residential and relaxing. 

Max was also very accessible to us throughout our stay. We were easily able to contact him when we had questions. He also set up a taxi reservation for us upon our return to the EZE airport. 

All in all, we really enjoyed our stay in Buenos Aires, and I have no doubt it was largely due to having such a wonderful place to stay in and an awesome host. Gracias, Max & Giselle!

We had a fantastic stay at Max and Giselle's apartment. They were great at communicating with us before and during our stay and gave us helpful tips on restaurants and things to do in the area when we arrived.

The apartment was clean, modern, and very comfortable for our 5 day stay. The location in Palermo made for an easy walk to restaurants and shopping or a quick metro ride to sights downtown.
Max foi um ótimo anfitrião, sempre nos ajudando com todas as dúvidas. O apartamento é otimo e bem localizado, e as fotos representam bem.

This was such a fantastic experience!  We loved it here and can't wait to come back.  Max was incredibly welcoming, giving us tips on what to do and where to go.  The apartment itself was small, but absolutely perfect for my husband and I  It was very cozy and we felt at home there.  The location really cannot be beat.  It had everything within walking distance - shops, restaurants, the subway, etc.  If they had an option for a 10 star review, that's how highly I'd recommend this place.  Thanks for everything and we look forward to coming back soon!

Max was a great host! We arrived early in the day and had no trouble getting the key from the guard at the gate. The apartment was as described in the photos. Everything was neat and clean. The apartment is small but perfect for two people who were out and about most of the time. The sitting area was a nice place to unwind after walking around all day.

The shower is a little tough to get in and out but works well. I would caution anyone elderly or who has a leg/hip injury for this reason but should not deter anyone else. Of course, we could have missed a door or easy way to get in...we never asked about it.

The bed was comfortable and the building was very nice. The guards at the gate were always very friendly and are there 24/7. We used the laundry facilities which worked as expected but did not use the gym or anything else. The wifi also worked great.

The location is good. We walked to almost all of our meals and to about half of the sites we wanted to see. The neighborhood is quiet but is a 5 minute walk from lots of restaurants, bars and shops.

Max made himself available for recommendations and helped us arrange airport transportation since we were leaving very early in the AM but we did see plenty of cabs pass by at that hour so wasn't necessary.

Overall, I would recommend this apartment to any couple or single person visiting for business or pleasure.

I really enjoyed my stay at Max & Giselle's place. The apartment is secure and the neighborhood is wonderful. Max is a very great host. He was able to answer all of my questions before I arrived and I felt very comfortable staying at their place. Max also gave me some great food recommendations! Their apartment is in a safe neighborhood and walking distance from the bus/subway if you're interested in moving around. I highly recommend staying there!
Loved this apartment and its location was perfect. Max is such a nice host and its suggestions were really useful. Would definitely stay there again.

This house was enormous chance for me. Most importantly, the communication with the host Max was very easy and he is very friendly and helpful. I thank him again for everything.

The location of house is very central and the transportation is very convenient to everywhere. The house is modern, very clean and all household goods are available. Security is also plus. There are a lot of nice restaurants, shopping mall, süpermarket etc around the house . Many tourist attractions is within walking distance. I hope to stay here again when I come to Buenos Aires.

A lovely, functional apartment that serves as a great base from which to explore Palermo and Buenos Aires. Max was accommodating in providing us w tips on where to go - Plaza Armenia and Plaza Serrano are worth a visit. This was our first Airbnb experience, and we were very pleased with it.

My experience at Max's place was awesome. It is incredibly well located, really close to great trendy restaurants, shops, and bars in Palermo Soho. The apartment itself is cozy and has a very modern style. You have everything you might need to make your stay pleasant. I would recommend this place.

Max and Giselle's place was great, very well located close to bars and restaurants and the apartment was just as described. Communication was easy and Max popped by early in our stay to give us some tips of local places to visit. I would definitely stay here again if I return to BA!

The apartment was a perfect size for my me and my girlfriend. The building is modern/sleek with 24/7 gated security. Palermo Soho is very conveniently located to a number of the city's best parks including the zoo, Japanese Gardens and Botanical Gardens. There is also an outlet mall with high end brands less than four blocks away. The pool and hot tub were under renovation during our stay, but with fall approaching, this probably won't be too much of an issue.
A lovely apartment and very well located.  I would love to stay there again.

Great apartment in a fantastic neighborhood. Also Max was a great host, providing help when needed and had a few good tips of the area. 
I can only recommend to stay here!

The apartment is in a great location in Palermo Soho - close to the metro, close to shops and walking distance to many attractions, including the Botanical Gardens, the Planetarium and the Evita Museum. Max was great at communicating with us by text and email as the trip approached and was lovely when we met him in person, and full of tips for the area. The apartment is in a very secure building with staff on duty at the front gate 24/7.

The appartment was great and as described on the website. It was perfect for a couple on a "city break". It is close to the area of Palermo Soho and all its shops restaurants and bars (and even milonga). It is also close to the metro which will take you around the city. Max was very helpful on our first day showing us all the places to go to and visit and giving us a good idea of thz city. The only thing i could say is the appartment was a bit noisy with the sound of the street. Nothing out of the ordinary however for someone living in the city.

We struck gold with the spot. The location was amazing, the apartment was cute and very comfortable, and Max and Gisele were lovely and extremely helpful. We had questions throughout our stay and they were always quick and thorough in responding. Max even reserved a taxi for us to get to the airport! It was totally unnecessary but he did it anyway. That's an awesome host :) We are so so so glad we stayed here!

Max has been really welcoming and always took care of us from the beginning to the end. Giving us some great spots and ordering us our last cab. 
Thanks again max! You made our trip

The apartment was in a great location and served as a perfect home base to explore Buenos Aires for the first time. Max was incredibly helpful and readily available to answer questions! Highly recommended.

Very nice studio apartment, very well located in Palermo next to bars and restaurants, Max welcomed us warmly and gave us a lot of recommendations. The swimming pool was very nice and relaxing on the hot summer days ! Would come back anytime !
Max was very helpful with tips on what to do in BA. Their place is in a fun area with lots of cool restaurants and shops nearby.
In a beautiful part of the city is this lovely appartment in BA. Max was helpfull. Love to come back again!

Max was a great host and very accomodating. The apartment is in an amazing location on a quiet street in Palermo. While perhaps not as new or clean as the photos, it was still an excellent place to stay.
Tolles Appartment in ruhiger, authentischer Nachbarschaft. Attraktionen und Subte Station fußläufig erreichbar. Gastgeber immer erreichbar und hilfsbereit. Jederzeit wieder.

Max and Gisela were good hosts, helpful and flexible. We got a lot of useful informations.
The comfortable, secure flat is a very good place to explore from there Palermo and BA and  to have a relaxing retreat.

We stayed in this cute apartment in Palermo Soho for 5 nights last week and couldn't have been happier. The listing is very true to the pictures. It's homely and stylish and there's lots of storage room for luggage. Theres a kettle, toaster, oven and fridge which made eating in and breakfasts easy and helped our budget!
Access to a gym and Pool and laundry were also easy and we made full use of them.
Max met us to talk us through the area which was so helpful as the city is enormous and difficult to access as a tourist but with Max's help we found this beautiful park that locals used in which we wondered and sunbathed and people watched. We ate out at his recommendations and made full use of this cool, fun and lively area.
We were also very lucky to be treated to some free tickets, by Max, which we were so grateful for!  To watch the Polo, an Argentine  favoured past time, in Palermo was a fantastic experience.

I had an amazing experience staying with Max and Giselle. The apartment has everything you need for a comfortable stay, the balcony is very nice to spend time on as well as the pool area. The building is very secure with 24/7 security on sight, you can't get in unless you are buzzed in. The location is amazing, the best restaurants, bars, metro is all within walking distance. The neighborhood is very trendy with a lot of young people and very safe, during the day and at night. Every time I messaged Max with a question he got back to me right away.Highly recommend staying with Max and Giselle!!!

The apartment was great, just as pictured! The location was perfect, walking distance to Palermo Soho and Hollywood with several great restaurants, bars, and cafes. Also walking distance from several great plazas and parks. Max was very knowledgable about the neighborhood and able to provide great recommendations. Max was available for all of my questions and checked in often to see how things were going. Great time at this apartment and I would definitely stay again next time in BA!
Everything was perfect. thank you Max!

Max and Giselle apartment was exactly what I expected , nicely appointed , cozy and a great location . the service at the building is great and I will definitely stay again there on a future trip to Buenos Aires. Max was very and came to the unit to introduce himself and check that everything was going fine. A great host
Nice apartment, well located.. The hosts were  really nice to accommodate a last minute request and were lovely and easy to communicate with

Max and Giselle were great hosts. Max greeted us when we arrived and handed us the keys and we were able to stay longer than the check out time because of a later flight. The location of this apartment is in the center of Palermo Soho minutes from trendy, restaurants, bars, and boutiques. The apartment was safe with 24 hour security at the front and it was very clean and spacious.

Max and Giselle's apartment is just as pictured and wonderfully located. Situated on a cute street close to the heart of Palermo, the Subte, and wonderful shops, restaurants, and bars, this place is an ideal base from which to explore Buenos Aires. The apartment itself is clean, adorable, and fully equipped. 

More importantly, Max and Giselle are some of the most responsive and considerate hosts I've had through Airbnb (which is saying a lot, because we've always had wonderful experiences).  Max responded to my emails in minutes, helped us arrange for an early arrival, and gave us great recommendations. He was communicative, warm, and enthusiastic-- I couldn't ask for more from a host!

If it's available, book it!

We are so pleased to have selected this apartment for our stay in BA.
Palermo is a great area full of little interesting shops and restaurants and we had all of that within walking distance.
Apartment was as described, very enjoyable for us as a couple. I have to make mention of the comfortable bed too. Amazing, especially after having been travelling for 3 weeks previously and not having good sleeps. 
Max was very helpful in the lead up and then came and visited us to give us some tips as well which was appreciated. He was available anytime we had questions.
Tip, if you want a great local restaurant on your first night just head up the road a couple of blocks to Simplemente- Corner Oro & Soler. Delicious and affordable italian food.

Had a fantastic stay at Max and Giselle's apartment. The building is very well located, with a doorman, and the area feels very safe all day long. It's a short walk away from the Metro and about a 10 minute walk from the hip centre of Palermo, making it a great place to stay when you visit Buenos Aires. Max and Giselle are also wonderful people, communicative and very helpful. The apartment was clean, very well decorated and had everything I needed to make my stay as easy as possible.

Excellent! Wonderful luxury apartment in very trendy, safe neighborhood. Host was very helpful and answered all of our numerous questions. Kitchen, bathroom, a/c & heater all worked very well. Just a couple blocks from Metro, as well as numerous dining & shopping options.
